name: The Princess and the Cardiothanatologist
description:
You're a cardiothanatologist, sent by a witch to perform a post-mortem heart transplant for the princess! Will you do anything to save her from a fate already had, or will you stay true to your hippcratic oath? What is a heart worth!?

Chillenium 2023.

Gameplay video: https://youtu.be/Vm31iKMKtBo

Controls:

A/D - Left/Right

W/Space - Jump

Left click - Shotgun Shovel attack

Right click - Purify (aura attack)

P - Pause Menu
